ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Sleepy Hollow
ComicInfo.Summary:
After the shocking ending of issue 1, the group responsible for a murder pledge to keep it a secret. But Sela has showed up on campus for a lecture on Tarrytown's infamous 'Headless Horseman' as she tells the real story behind the legend. That night, a body returns to collect the heads of those responsible for taking his... The soul of the Headless Horseman has returned and vengeance is necessary!
